Question 153) On a storm day, the change in the depth of a river, in a given place, was recorded for a period of 4 hours. The results are indicated on the line graph. In it, depth H, recorded at 1 pm, was not noted and, from H, each unit on the vertical axis represents one meter.
Time 0 Depth (M) Depth Record 13 14 15 16 17 It was informed that between 15 hours and 16 hours, the depth of the river decreased by 10%.
At 4 pm, what is the depth of the river, in Metro, where the records were made?
A) 18
B) 20
C) 24
D) 36
E) 40
